original: induction n. - simpl. auto. - rewrite PS_derive_n. replace (fun k : nat => INR (fact (k + S n)) / INR (fact k) * a (k + S n)%nat) with (PS_derive (PS_derive_n n a)). ++ rewrite CV_radius_derive. apply IHn. ++ apply functional_extensionality. intros k. unfold PS_derive. unfold PS_derive_n. rewrite Nat.add_succ_r. rewrite mult_INR. rewrite S_INR. rewrite Rmult_assoc. rewrite <- Rinv_l_sym. rewrite Rmult_1_r. auto. apply not_eq_sym. apply INR_fact_neq_0.
